sentence.Network_en: Detectives have run into a conspiracy of silence in the tight-knit communities of the peninsula.
sentence.Network_cn: 侦探们犯了难，半岛上各个群体抱成一团，达成了保持缄默的密约。

sentence.Network_en: These guys are one of the most tight - knit bands around.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些家伙是属于这儿的最团结的一个乐队.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 潜在机制，代际关系（尤其是亲子关系）可以被区分为五大类型：紧密型（tight-knit）、社交型（sociable）、亲密有间型（intimate b…
Michelle地道英语教室--No.240 Tie-播客节目... ... tight-knit 紧密团结的关系密切的 Tie-up 联合合作.
Michelle地道英语教室--No.239 Tight... ... Tight-fitting 紧身的贴身的 tight-knit 紧密团结的关系密切的.

list.abs: We ' re a tight - knit family and want to keep it that way ., 我们是一个亲密的大家庭 , 并且希望能够一直这样下去.
knitting tension 编织张力knitting tightness 编织密度knitting yarn 毛线
纱织密度 knitting tightness成分(构成,组成) ingredient OR component element平缝机 plainstitch machine 包缝机 whipstitch machine 同时,在这里面重要的不是单词.
wolves live in tight-knit social groups that are regulated by strict rules .狼生活在一个组织严密的社会团体中，受到严格规则的约束。
another explanation is cultural : Asians may find it especially hard to imagine leaving behind tight-knit families .另一种和文化有关的解释：亚洲人觉得离开亲密家庭的难以想象。
